name: @codefish/dev-configs
description: Shared configurations for dev tools across CodeFish Studio projects.

scripts.build: bun run clean && tsc && bun run copy-configs
scripts.copy-configs: cp -r src/configs/prettier dist/configs/ && cp -r src/configs/typescript dist/configs/ && cp -r src/configs/editors dist/configs/
scripts.release:major: bun pm version major && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:minor: bun pm version minor && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:patch: bun pm version patch && git push && git push --tags
scripts.version: sh -c 'tsx src/scripts/updateReadmeVersion/index.ts && git add README.md package.json'
scripts.check: bun run lint && bun run types
